meanings.definition: Yokozunas: plural noun, the highest rank in sumo wrestling
meanings.sent1: In sumo wrestling, only the most skilled athletes can become yokozunas.
meanings.sent2: The yokozunas are revered for their strength and technique in the sport.
meanings.sent3: At the sumo tournament, the yokozunas performed a traditional ritual before their matches.
meanings.sent4: The yokozunas stand as symbols of excellence and honor in the sumo community.
meanings.sent5: The crowd erupted in cheers as the yokozunas entered the ring, ready to compete.

meanings.definition: Yokozunas: verb, to achieve the highest rank in sumo wrestling
meanings.sent1: Many aspiring sumo wrestlers dream of one day yokozunaing.
meanings.sent2: He trained tirelessly to yokozuna and reach the pinnacle of his career.
meanings.sent3: After years of hard work, he finally yokozunaed and earned the respect of his peers.
meanings.sent4: To yokozuna requires not just skill, but also dedication and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: His ultimate goal was to yokozuna and be recognized as the best in the sport.
